title: ISSS608-VAA
text: Welcome to ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications. In this website, you will find my coursework prepared for this course.

title: Hands-on Exercise 2
text:
pacman::p_load(ggrepel,patchwork, ggthemes,hrbrthemes, tidyverse)

Already remote install hrbrthemes, hide it with ‘{r incluse=False}’.




exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

title: Hands-on Exercise 2
text:
pacman::p_load(ggrepel,patchwork, ggthemes,hrbrthemes, tidyverse)

Already remote install hrbrthemes, hide it with ‘{r incluse=False}’.

title: Hands-on Exercise 2
text:
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

title: Hands-on Exercise 2
text:
2.3.1 Working with ggrepel

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = ID), 
                   fontface = "bold") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100)) +
  ggtitle("English scores versus Maths scores for Primary 3")

Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.


`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'


Warning: ggrepel: 317 unlabeled data points (too many overlaps). Consider
increasing max.overlaps









memo: using ‘geom_label_rebel’ prevent overlapping labels

title: Hands-on Exercise 2
text:
2.4.1 Working with ggtheme package

ggplot(data = exam_data,        # 使用 exam_data 作為資料來源
       aes(x = MATHS)) +        # 指定 X 軸為數學成績
  geom_histogram(bins = 20,     # 將數學成績分成 20 個區間
                 boundary = 100, # 以 100 作為直方圖的分箱邊界
                 color = "grey25", # 長條圖邊框顏色（深灰）
                 fill = "grey90") + # 長條圖填滿顏色（淺灰）
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores") + # 圖表標題
  theme_economist()             # 套用 Economist 風格主題（來自 ggthemes）

title: Hands-on Exercise 2
text:
2.4.2 Working with hrbthems package

ggplot(data = exam_data,        # 使用 exam_data 作為資料來源
       aes(x = MATHS)) +        # 指定 X 軸為數學成績
  geom_histogram(bins = 20,     # 將數學成績分成 20 個區間
                 boundary = 100, # 以 100 作為分箱的邊界（符合成績上限）
                 color = "grey25", # 直方圖邊框顏色（深灰）
                 fill = "grey90") + # 直方圖填滿顏色（淺灰）
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores") + # 設定圖表標題
  theme_ipsum()                # 套用 hrbrthemes 的 ipsum 主題（簡潔、無多餘格線）








memo: font issue still can’t solve, so setting warning=FALSE to avoid messing interface

ggplot(data = exam_data,            # 使用 exam_data 作為資料來源
       aes(x = MATHS)) +            # 指定 X 軸為數學成績
  geom_histogram(bins = 20,         # 將數學成績分成 20 個區間
                 boundary = 100,    # 以 100 作為分箱邊界（符合成績上限）
                 color = "grey25",  # 直方圖邊框顏色（深灰）
                 fill = "grey90") + # 直方圖填滿顏色（淺灰）
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores") + # 設定圖表標題
  theme_ipsum(axis_title_size = 18, # 設定座標軸標題字體大小
              base_size = 15,       # 設定整體字體的基準大小
              grid = "Y")           # 僅顯示 Y 軸格線，提升讀值可讀性

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)





exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
1.7.2 Geometric Objects: geom_dotplot點點圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, aes(x=MATHS))+
  geom_dotplot(binwidth = 2.5,
               dotsize = 0.5) + 
  scale_y_continuous(NULL,
                     breaks = NULL)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
1.7.3 Geometric Objects: geom_histogram()直方圖

ggplot(data=exam_data,
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram()

`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value `binwidth`.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.7.5 Modifying a geometric object by changing aes() 摺疊直方圖
text:
1.7.5 Modifying a geometric object by changing aes() 摺疊直方圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           fill = GENDER)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 color="grey30")

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
1.7.6 Geometric Objects: geom-density() 折線圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_density()           









ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS, 
           colour = GENDER)) +
  geom_density()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
1.7.7 Geometric Objects: geom_boxplot箱型圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS,       
           x= GENDER)) +    
  geom_boxplot()            









ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot(notch=TRUE)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.7.8 Geometric Objects: geom_violin 小提琴圖
text:
1.7.8 Geometric Objects: geom_violin 小提琴圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_violin()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
1.7.9 Geometric Objects: geom_point()散點圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.7.10 geom objects can be combined 組合圖
text:
1.7.10 geom objects can be combined 組合圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +                    
  geom_point(position="jitter", 
             size = 0.5)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.8.2 Working with stat - the stat_summary() method 加上平均值
text:
1.8.2 Working with stat - the stat_summary() method 加上平均值

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  stat_summary(geom = "point",       
               fun = "mean",         
               colour ="red",
               size=4)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.8.3 Working with stat - the geom() method 加上平均值
text:
1.8.3 Working with stat - the geom() method 加上平均值

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary",        
             fun="mean",           
             colour="red",          
             size=4)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.8.4 Adding a best fit curve on a scatterplot 趨勢線
text:
1.8.4 Adding a best fit curve on a scatterplot 趨勢線

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(size=0.5)

Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.


`geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'










ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              linewidth=0.5)

`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
1.9.1 Working with facet_wrap()多張圖

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
    facet_wrap(~ CLASS)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
1.9.2 facet_grid() function

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
    facet_grid(~ CLASS)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.10.1 Working with Coordinate 圖表轉向
text:
1.10.1 Working with Coordinate 圖表轉向

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.10.2 Changing the y- and x-axis range 交換x,y軸
text:
1.10.2 Changing the y- and x-axis range 交換x,y軸

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, size=0.5)

`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'










ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100))

`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
section: 1.11.1 Working with theme 修改底色
text:
1.11.1 Working with theme 修改底色

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_gray()









ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_classic()









ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
